items.title: Design
items.toolTipText: A RUX challenge is a fast-paced design competition focused on user experience (UX) and UI design—typically over a short period (like 24–72 hours). It's used to rapidly explore ideas, design directions, or concept interfaces for a product or feature. Here are 2 example challenge links:

links.text: RUX - 72HR Quintessential Home Buying Experience Design Concepts Challenge
links.desc: Develop a unified application to streamline the home buying process.

links.text: RUX - 72HR Vulcan Command Centre Portal Dashboard Design Challenge
links.desc: Design a command center interface for Vulcan's global operations.

items.toolTipText: A RUX challenge is a fast-paced design competition focused on user experience (UX) and UI design—typically over a short period (like 24–72 hours). It's used to rapidly explore ideas, design directions, or concept interfaces for a product or feature. Here are 2 example challenge links:

links.text: RUX - 72HR Quintessential Home Buying Experience Design Concepts Challenge
links.desc: Develop a unified application to streamline the home buying process.

links.text: RUX - 72HR Vulcan Command Centre Portal Dashboard Design Challenge
links.desc: Design a command center interface for Vulcan's global operations.
